ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina yuqimuna al-salata wayu'tuna al-zakata wahum bil-akhirati hum yuqinuna
ayah_english: Those who establish the prayer and give zakah and they in the Hereafter [they] believe with certainty

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati zayyanna lahum a'malahum fahum ya'mahuna
ayah_english: Indeed those who (do) not believe in the Hereafter We have made fair-seeming to them their deeds so they wander blindly

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ
ayah_translit: ulaika alladhina lahum suu al-'adhabi wahum fi al-akhirati humu al-akhsaruna
ayah_english: Those (are) the ones for them (is) an evil [the] punishment and they in the Hereafter [they] (will be) the greatest losers

ayah: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ
ayah_translit: wa-innaka latulaqqa al-qur'ana min ladun hakimin alimin
ayah_english: And indeed, you surely, receive the Quran from [near] from [near] the All-Wise the All-Knower

ayah: إِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهۡلِهِۦٓ إِنِّيٓ ءَانَسۡتُ نَارٗا سَـَٔاتِيكُم مِّنۡهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوۡ ءَاتِيكُم بِشِهَابٖ قَبَسٖ لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَصۡطَلُونَ
ayah_translit: idh qala musa li-ahlihi inni anastu naran saatikum min'ha bikhabarin aw atikum bishihabin qabasin la'allakum tastaluna
ayah_english: When said Musa to his family Indeed I perceive a fire I will bring you from it some information or I will bring you a torch burning so that you may warm yourselves

ayah: إِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهۡلِهِۦٓ إِنِّيٓ ءَانَسۡتُ نَارٗا سَـَٔاتِيكُم مِّنۡهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوۡ ءَاتِيكُم بِشِهَابٖ قَبَسٖ لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَصۡطَلُونَ
ayah_translit: idh qala musa li-ahlihi inni anastu naran saatikum min'ha bikhabarin aw atikum bishihabin qabasin la'allakum tastaluna

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِيَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهَا وَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma jaaha nudiya an burika man fi al-nari waman hawlaha wasub'hana al-lahi rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: But when he came to it he was called [that] Blessed is who (is) at the fire and whoever (is) around it And glory be (to) Allah (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: yamusa innahu ana al-lahu al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: O Musa! Indeed I Am Allah the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: وَأَلۡقِ عَصَاكَۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهۡتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنّٞ وَلَّىٰ مُدۡبِرٗا وَلَمۡ يُعَقِّبۡۚ يَٰمُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفۡ إِنِّي لَا يَخَافُ لَدَيَّ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-alqi asaka falamma raaha tahtazzu ka-annaha jannun walla mud'biran walam yu'aqqib yamusa la takhaf inni la yakhafu ladayya al-mur'saluna
ayah_english: And Throw your staff But when he saw it moving as if it (were) a snake he turned back (in) flight and (did) not look back O Musa! (Do) not fear Indeed [I] (do) not fear (in) My presence the Messengers

ayah: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسۡنَۢا بَعۡدَ سُوٓءٖ فَإِنِّي غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
ayah_translit: illa man zalama thumma baddala hus'nan ba'da suin fa-inni ghafurun rahimun
ayah_english: Except who wrongs then substitutes good after evil then indeed I Am Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: وَأَدۡخِلۡ يَدَكَ فِي جَيۡبِكَ تَخۡرُجۡ بَيۡضَآءَ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ سُوٓءٖۖ فِي تِسۡعِ ءَايَٰتٍ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَقَوۡمِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-adkhil yadaka fi jaybika takhruj baydaa min ghayri suin fi tis'i ayatin ila fir'awna waqawmihi innahum kanu qawman fasiqina
ayah_english: And enter your hand into your bosom it will come forth white without without harm (These are) among nine signs to Firaun and his people Indeed, they are a people defiantly disobedient

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡهُمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا مُبۡصِرَةٗ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: falamma jaathum ayatuna mub'siratan qalu hadha sih'run mubinun
ayah_english: But when came to them Our Signs visible they said This (is) a magic manifest

ayah: وَجَحَدُواْ بِهَا وَٱسۡتَيۡقَنَتۡهَآ أَنفُسُهُمۡ ظُلۡمٗا وَعُلُوّٗاۚ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: wajahadu biha wa-is'tayqanatha anfusuhum zul'man wa'uluwwan fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-muf'sidina
ayah_english: And they rejected them though were convinced with them (signs) themselves (out of) injustice and haughtiness So see how was (the) end (of) the corrupters

ayah: وَجَحَدُواْ بِهَا وَٱسۡتَيۡقَنَتۡهَآ أَنفُسُهُمۡ ظُلۡمٗا وَعُلُوّٗاۚ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ عِلۡمٗاۖ وَقَالَا ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٖ مِّنۡ عِبَادِهِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna dawuda wasulaymana il'man waqala al-hamdu lillahi alladhi faddalana ala kathirin min ibadihi al-mu'minina
ayah_english: And verily We gave Dawood and Sulaiman knowledge and they said Praise be to Allah the One Who has favored us over many of His servants the believers

ayah_english: And verily We gave Dawood and Sulaiman knowledge and they said Praise be to Allah the One Who has favored us over many of His servants the believers

ayah: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيۡمَٰنُ دَاوُۥدَۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ عُلِّمۡنَا مَنطِقَ ٱلطَّيۡرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
ayah_translit: wawaritha sulaymanu dawuda waqala yaayyuha al-nasu ullim'na mantiqa al-tayri wautina min kulli shayin inna hadha lahuwa al-fadlu al-mubinu
ayah_english: And inherited Sulaiman Dawood And he said O people! We have been taught (the) language (of) the birds and we have been given from every thing Indeed this surely it (is) the favor evident

ayah: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيۡمَٰنُ دَاوُۥدَۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ عُلِّمۡنَا مَنطِقَ ٱلطَّيۡرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

ayah: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيۡمَٰنُ دَاوُۥدَۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ عُلِّمۡنَا مَنطِقَ ٱلطَّيۡرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

ayah: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيۡرِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ
ayah_translit: wahushira lisulaymana junuduhu mina al-jini wal-insi wal-tayri fahum yuza'una
ayah_english: And were gathered for Sulaiman his hosts of jinn and the men and the birds and they (were) set in rows

ayah: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيۡرِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَوۡاْ عَلَىٰ وَادِ ٱلنَّمۡلِ قَالَتۡ نَمۡلَةٞ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّمۡلُ ٱدۡخُلُواْ مَسَٰكِنَكُمۡ لَا يَحۡطِمَنَّكُمۡ سُلَيۡمَٰنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
ayah_translit: hatta idha ataw ala wadi al-namli qalat namlatun yaayyuha al-namlu ud'khulu masakinakum la yahtimannakum sulaymanu wajunuduhu wahum la yash'uruna
ayah_english: Until when they came to (the) valley (of) the ants said an ant O ants Enter your dwellings lest not crush you lest not crush you Sulaiman and his hosts while they (do) not perceive (do) not perceive

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَوۡاْ عَلَىٰ وَادِ ٱلنَّمۡلِ قَالَتۡ نَمۡلَةٞ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّمۡلُ ٱدۡخُلُواْ مَسَٰكِنَكُمۡ لَا يَحۡطِمَنَّكُمۡ سُلَيۡمَٰنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَوۡاْ عَلَىٰ وَادِ ٱلنَّمۡلِ قَالَتۡ نَمۡلَةٞ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّمۡلُ ٱدۡخُلُواْ مَسَٰكِنَكُمۡ لَا يَحۡطِمَنَّكُمۡ سُلَيۡمَٰنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

ayah_english: Until when they came to (the) valley (of) the ants said an ant O ants Enter your dwellings lest not crush you lest not crush you Sulaiman and his hosts while they (do) not perceive (do) not perceive

ayah: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكٗا مِّن قَوۡلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَدۡخِلۡنِي بِرَحۡمَتِكَ فِي عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: fatabassama dahikan min qawliha waqala rabbi awzi'ni an ashkura ni'mataka allati an'amta alayya wa'ala walidayya wa-an a'mala salihan tardahu wa-adkhil'ni birahmatika fi ibadika al-salihina
ayah_english: So he smiled laughing at her speech and said My Lord! Grant me (the) power that I may thank You (for) Your Favor which You have bestowed on me and on my parents and that I may do righteous (deeds) that will please You And admit me by Your Mercy among Your slaves righteous

ayah: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكٗا مِّن قَوۡلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَدۡخِلۡنِي بِرَحۡمَتِكَ فِي عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

ayah: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكٗا مِّن قَوۡلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَدۡخِلۡنِي بِرَحۡمَتِكَ فِي عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

ayah: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيۡرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِيَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلۡهُدۡهُدَ أَمۡ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَآئِبِينَ
ayah_translit: watafaqqada al-tayra faqala ma liya la ara al-hud'huda am kana mina al-ghaibina
ayah_english: And he inspected the birds and said Why Why not I see the hoopoe or is he from the absent

ayah: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُۥ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدًا أَوۡ لَأَاْذۡبَحَنَّهُۥٓ أَوۡ لَيَأۡتِيَنِّي بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: la-u'adhibannahu adhaban shadidan aw laadh'bahannahu aw layatiyanni bisul'tanin mubinin
ayah_english: I will surely punish him (with) a punishment severe or I will surely slaughter him unless he brings me a reason clear

ayah: فَمَكَثَ غَيۡرَ بَعِيدٖ فَقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمۡ تُحِطۡ بِهِۦ وَجِئۡتُكَ مِن سَبَإِۭ بِنَبَإٖ يَقِينٍ
ayah_translit: famakatha ghayra ba'idin faqala ahattu bima lam tuhit bihi waji'tuka min saba-in binaba-in yaqinin
ayah_english: So he stayed not long and he said I have encompassed that which not you have encompassed it and I have come to you from Saba with news certain

ayah: إِنِّي وَجَدتُّ ٱمۡرَأَةٗ تَمۡلِكُهُمۡ وَأُوتِيَتۡ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَلَهَا عَرۡشٌ عَظِيمٞ
ayah_translit: inni wajadttu im'ra-atan tamlikuhum wautiyat min kulli shayin walaha arshun azimun
ayah_english: Indeed I found a woman ruling them and she has been given of every thing and for her (is) a throne great

ayah: وَجَدتُّهَا وَقَوۡمَهَا يَسۡجُدُونَ لِلشَّمۡسِ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فَصَدَّهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ فَهُمۡ لَا يَهۡتَدُونَ
ayah_translit: wajadttuha waqawmaha yasjuduna lilshamsi min duni al-lahi wazayyana lahumu al-shaytanu a'malahum fasaddahum ani al-sabili fahum la yahtaduna
ayah_english: And I found her and her people prostrating to the sun instead of Allah instead of Allah instead of Allah and has made fair-seeming to them the Shaitaan their deeds and averted them from the Way so they (are) not guided

ayah: أَلَّاۤ يَسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡخَبۡءَ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُخۡفُونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ
ayah_translit: alla yasjudu lillahi alladhi yukh'riju al-khaba-a fi al-samawati wal-ardi waya'lamu ma tukh'funa wama tu'linuna
ayah_english: That not they prostrate to Allah the One Who brings forth the hidden in the heavens and the earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare

ayah: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩
ayah_translit: al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa rabbu al-'arshi al-'azimi
ayah_english: Allah (there is) no god but He (the) Lord (of) the Throne the Great

ayah: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩
ayah_translit: al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa rabbu al-'arshi al-'azimi
ayah_english: Allah (there is) no god but He (the) Lord (of) the Throne the Great

ayah: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩

ayah: ۞قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
ayah_translit: qala sananzuru asadaqta am kunta mina al-kadhibina
ayah_english: He said We will see whether you speak (the) truth or you are of the liars

ayah: ٱذۡهَب بِّكِتَٰبِي هَٰذَا فَأَلۡقِهۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡ فَٱنظُرۡ مَاذَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: idh'hab bikitabi hadha fa-alqih ilayhim thumma tawalla anhum fa-unzur madha yarji'una
ayah_english: Go with my letter this and deliver it to them Then turn away from them and see what they return

ayah: قَالَتۡ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ إِنِّيٓ أُلۡقِيَ إِلَيَّ كِتَٰبٞ كَرِيمٌ
ayah_translit: qalat yaayyuha al-mala-u inni ul'qiya ilayya kitabun karimun
ayah_english: She said O chiefs! Indeed [I] is delivered to me a letter noble

ayah: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayah_translit: innahu min sulaymana wa-innahu bis'mi al-lahi al-rahmani al-rahimi
ayah_english: Indeed it (is) from Sulaiman and indeed it (is) In the name (of) Allah the Most Gracious the Most Merciful

ayah: أَلَّا تَعۡلُواْ عَلَيَّ وَأۡتُونِي مُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: alla ta'lu alayya watuni mus'limina
ayah_english: That not exalt yourselves against me but come to me (in) submission."

ayah: قَالَتۡ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَفۡتُونِي فِيٓ أَمۡرِي مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمۡرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشۡهَدُونِ
ayah_translit: qalat yaayyuha al-mala-u aftuni fi amri ma kuntu qati'atan amran hatta tashhaduni
ayah_english: She said O chiefs! Advise me in my affair Not I would be the one to decide any matter until you are present with me

ayah: قَالَتۡ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَفۡتُونِي فِيٓ أَمۡرِي مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمۡرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشۡهَدُونِ

ayah: قَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أُوْلُواْ قُوَّةٖ وَأُوْلُواْ بَأۡسٖ شَدِيدٖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ إِلَيۡكِ فَٱنظُرِي مَاذَا تَأۡمُرِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu nahnu ulu quwwatin wa-ulu basin shadidin wal-amru ilayki fa-unzuri madha tamurina
ayah_english: They said We (are) possessors (of) strength and possessors (of) might great and the command (is) up to you so look what you will command

ayah: قَالَتۡ إِنَّ ٱلۡمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُواْ قَرۡيَةً أَفۡسَدُوهَا وَجَعَلُوٓاْ أَعِزَّةَ أَهۡلِهَآ أَذِلَّةٗۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ
ayah_translit: qalat inna al-muluka idha dakhalu qaryatan afsaduha waja'alu a'izzata ahliha adhillatan wakadhalika yaf 'aluna
ayah_english: She said Indeed the kings when they enter a town they ruin it and make (the) most honorable (of) its people (the) lowest And thus they do

ayah: وَإِنِّي مُرۡسِلَةٌ إِلَيۡهِم بِهَدِيَّةٖ فَنَاظِرَةُۢ بِمَ يَرۡجِعُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-inni mur'silatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanaziratun bima yarji'u al-mur'saluna
ayah_english: But indeed I am going to send to them a gift and see with what return the messengers

ayah_translit: wa-inni mur'silatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanaziratun bima yarji'u al-mur'saluna
ayah_english: But indeed I am going to send to them a gift and see with what return the messengers

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَ قَالَ أَتُمِدُّونَنِ بِمَالٖ فَمَآ ءَاتَىٰنِۦَ ٱللَّهُ خَيۡرٞ مِّمَّآ ءَاتَىٰكُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُم بِهَدِيَّتِكُمۡ تَفۡرَحُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma jaa sulaymana qala atumiddunani bimalin fama ataniya al-lahu khayrun mimma atakum bal antum bihadiyyatikum tafrahuna
ayah_english: So when came (to) Sulaiman he said Will you provide me with wealth But what Allah has given me Allah has given me (is) better than what He has given you Nay you in your gift rejoice

ayah: ٱرۡجِعۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ فَلَنَأۡتِيَنَّهُم بِجُنُودٖ لَّا قِبَلَ لَهُم بِهَا وَلَنُخۡرِجَنَّهُم مِّنۡهَآ أَذِلَّةٗ وَهُمۡ صَٰغِرُونَ
ayah_translit: ir'ji' ilayhim falanatiyannahum bijunudin la qibala lahum biha walanukh'rijannahum min'ha adhillatan wahum saghiruna
ayah_english: Return to them surely we will come to them with hosts not (is) resistance for them of it and surely we will drive them out from there (in) humiliation and they (will be) abased

ayah: ٱرۡجِعۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ فَلَنَأۡتِيَنَّهُم بِجُنُودٖ لَّا قِبَلَ لَهُم بِهَا وَلَنُخۡرِجَنَّهُم مِّنۡهَآ أَذِلَّةٗ وَهُمۡ صَٰغِرُونَ
ayah_translit: ir'ji' ilayhim falanatiyannahum bijunudin la qibala lahum biha walanukh'rijannahum min'ha adhillatan wahum saghiruna

ayah: قَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَيُّكُمۡ يَأۡتِينِي بِعَرۡشِهَا قَبۡلَ أَن يَأۡتُونِي مُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qala yaayyuha al-mala-u ayyukum yatini bi'arshiha qabla an yatuni mus'limina
ayah_english: He said O chiefs! Which of you will bring me her throne before that they come to me (in) submission

ayah: قَالَ عِفۡرِيتٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَۖ وَإِنِّي عَلَيۡهِ لَقَوِيٌّ أَمِينٞ
ayah_translit: qala if'ritun mina al-jini ana atika bihi qabla an taquma min maqamika wa-inni alayhi laqawiyyun aminun
ayah_english: Said a strong one of the jinn I will bring it to you will bring it to you before [that] you rise from your place And indeed, I am for it surely, strong trustworthy

ayah: قَالَ ٱلَّذِي عِندَهُۥ عِلۡمٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَن يَرۡتَدَّ إِلَيۡكَ طَرۡفُكَۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهُ مُسۡتَقِرًّا عِندَهُۥ قَالَ هَٰذَا مِن فَضۡلِ رَبِّي لِيَبۡلُوَنِيٓ ءَأَشۡكُرُ أَمۡ أَكۡفُرُۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّي غَنِيّٞ كَرِيمٞ
ayah_translit: qala alladhi indahu il'mun mina al-kitabi ana atika bihi qabla an yartadda ilayka tarfuka falamma raahu mus'taqirran indahu qala hadha min fadli rabbi liyabluwani a-ashkuru am akfuru waman shakara fa-innama yashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fa-inna rabbi ghaniyyun karimun
ayah_english: Said one who with him (was) knowledge of the Scripture I will bring it to you will bring it to you before [that] returns to you your glance Then when he saw it placed before him he said This (is) from (the) Favor (of) my Lord to test me whether I am grateful or I am ungrateful And whoever (is) grateful then only he is grateful for his own soul And whoever (is) ungrateful then indeed my Lord (is) Self-sufficient Noble

ayah: قَالَ ٱلَّذِي عِندَهُۥ عِلۡمٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَن يَرۡتَدَّ إِلَيۡكَ طَرۡفُكَۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهُ مُسۡتَقِرًّا عِندَهُۥ قَالَ هَٰذَا مِن فَضۡلِ رَبِّي لِيَبۡلُوَنِيٓ ءَأَشۡكُرُ أَمۡ أَكۡفُرُۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّي غَنِيّٞ كَرِيمٞ

ayah: قَالَ ٱلَّذِي عِندَهُۥ عِلۡمٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَن يَرۡتَدَّ إِلَيۡكَ طَرۡفُكَۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهُ مُسۡتَقِرًّا عِندَهُۥ قَالَ هَٰذَا مِن فَضۡلِ رَبِّي لِيَبۡلُوَنِيٓ ءَأَشۡكُرُ أَمۡ أَكۡفُرُۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّي غَنِيّٞ كَرِيمٞ

ayah_translit: qala alladhi indahu il'mun mina al-kitabi ana atika bihi qabla an yartadda ilayka tarfuka falamma raahu mus'taqirran indahu qala hadha min fadli rabbi liyabluwani a-ashkuru am akfuru waman shakara fa-innama yashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fa-inna rabbi ghaniyyun karimun

ayah_english: Said one who with him (was) knowledge of the Scripture I will bring it to you will bring it to you before [that] returns to you your glance Then when he saw it placed before him he said This (is) from (the) Favor (of) my Lord to test me whether I am grateful or I am ungrateful And whoever (is) grateful then only he is grateful for his own soul And whoever (is) ungrateful then indeed my Lord (is) Self-sufficient Noble

ayah: قَالَ نَكِّرُواْ لَهَا عَرۡشَهَا نَنظُرۡ أَتَهۡتَدِيٓ أَمۡ تَكُونُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَهۡتَدُونَ
ayah_translit: qala nakkiru laha arshaha nanzur atahtadi am takunu mina alladhina la yahtaduna
ayah_english: He said Disguise for her her throne we will see whether she will be guided or will be of those who are not guided are not guided

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡ قِيلَ أَهَٰكَذَا عَرۡشُكِۖ قَالَتۡ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَۚ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلۡعِلۡمَ مِن قَبۡلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma jaat qila ahakadha arshuki qalat ka-annahu huwa wautina al-'il'ma min qabliha wakunna mus'limina
ayah_english: So when she came it was said Is like this your throne She said It is like it And we were given the knowledge before her before her and we have been Muslims

ayah_english: So when she came it was said Is like this your throne She said It is like it And we were given the knowledge before her before her and we have been Muslims

ayah: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعۡبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتۡ مِن قَوۡمٖ كَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wasaddaha ma kanat ta'budu min duni al-lahi innaha kanat min qawmin kafirina
ayah_english: And has averted her what she used (to) worship besides besides Allah Indeed, she was from a people who disbelieve

ayah: قِيلَ لَهَا ٱدۡخُلِي ٱلصَّرۡحَۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَتۡهُ حَسِبَتۡهُ لُجَّةٗ وَكَشَفَتۡ عَن سَاقَيۡهَاۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ صَرۡحٞ مُّمَرَّدٞ مِّن قَوَارِيرَۗ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمۡتُ نَفۡسِي وَأَسۡلَمۡتُ مَعَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: qila laha ud'khuli al-sarha falamma ra-athu hasibathu lujjatan wakashafat an saqayha qala innahu sarhun mumarradun min qawarira qalat rabbi inni zalamtu nafsi wa-aslamtu ma'a sulaymana lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: It was said to her Enter the palace Then when she saw it she thought it (was) a pool and she uncovered [on] her shins He said Indeed it (is) a palace made smooth of glass She said My Lord indeed I [I] have wronged myself and I submit with Sulaiman to Allah (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: قِيلَ لَهَا ٱدۡخُلِي ٱلصَّرۡحَۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَتۡهُ حَسِبَتۡهُ لُجَّةٗ وَكَشَفَتۡ عَن سَاقَيۡهَاۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ صَرۡحٞ مُّمَرَّدٞ مِّن قَوَارِيرَۗ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمۡتُ نَفۡسِي وَأَسۡلَمۡتُ مَعَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah_translit: qila laha ud'khuli al-sarha falamma ra-athu hasibathu lujjatan wakashafat an saqayha qala innahu sarhun mumarradun min qawarira qalat rabbi inni zalamtu nafsi wa-aslamtu ma'a sulaymana lillahi rabbi al-'alamina

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمۡ فَرِيقَانِ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna ila thamuda akhahum salihan ani u'budu al-laha fa-idha hum fariqani yakhtasimuna
ayah_english: And certainly We sent to Thamud their brother Salih that Worship Allah Then behold! They (became) two parties quarreling

ayah: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لِمَ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبۡلَ ٱلۡحَسَنَةِۖ لَوۡلَا تَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
ayah_translit: qala yaqawmi lima tasta'jiluna bil-sayi-ati qabla al-hasanati lawla tastaghfiruna al-laha la'allakum tur'hamuna
ayah_english: He said O my people! Why (do) you seek to hasten the evil before the good Why not you ask forgiveness (of) Allah so that you may receive mercy

ayah: قَالُواْ ٱطَّيَّرۡنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَۚ قَالَ طَـٰٓئِرُكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تُفۡتَنُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu ittayyarna bika wabiman ma'aka qala tairukum inda al-lahi bal antum qawmun tuf'tanuna
ayah_english: They said We consider you a bad omen We consider you a bad omen and those with you He said Your bad omen (is) with Allah Nay you (are) a people being tested

ayah: وَكَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡطٖ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ
ayah_translit: wakana fi al-madinati tis'atu rahtin yuf'siduna fi al-ardi wala yus'lihuna
ayah_english: And were in the city nine family heads they were spreading corruption in the land and not reforming

ayah: وَكَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡطٖ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

ayah: قَالُواْ تَقَاسَمُواْ بِٱللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهۡلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدۡنَا مَهۡلِكَ أَهۡلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu taqasamu bil-lahi lanubayyitannahu wa-ahlahu thumma lanaqulanna liwaliyyihi ma shahid'na mahlika ahlihi wa-inna lasadiquna
ayah_english: They said Swear to each other by Allah surely we will attack him by night and his family Then we will surely say to his heir Not we witnessed (the) destruction (of) his family and indeed we (are) surely truthful."

ayah: قَالُواْ تَقَاسَمُواْ بِٱللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهۡلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدۡنَا مَهۡلِكَ أَهۡلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ

ayah: قَالُواْ تَقَاسَمُواْ بِٱللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهۡلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدۡنَا مَهۡلِكَ أَهۡلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu taqasamu bil-lahi lanubayyitannahu wa-ahlahu thumma lanaqulanna liwaliyyihi ma shahid'na mahlika ahlihi wa-inna lasadiquna
ayah_english: They said Swear to each other by Allah surely we will attack him by night and his family Then we will surely say to his heir Not we witnessed (the) destruction (of) his family and indeed we (are) surely truthful."

ayah: قَالُواْ تَقَاسَمُواْ بِٱللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهۡلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدۡنَا مَهۡلِكَ أَهۡلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ

ayah: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wamakaru makran wamakarna makran wahum la yash'uruna
ayah_english: So they plotted a plot and We planned a plan while they (did) not perceive

ayah: فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ مَكۡرِهِمۡ أَنَّا دَمَّرۡنَٰهُمۡ وَقَوۡمَهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu makrihim anna dammarnahum waqawmahum ajma'ina

ayah: فَتِلۡكَ بُيُوتُهُمۡ خَاوِيَةَۢ بِمَا ظَلَمُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: fatil'ka buyutuhum khawiyatan bima zalamu inna fi dhalika laayatan liqawmin ya'lamuna
ayah_english: So these (are) their houses ruined because they wronged Indeed in that surely is a sign for a people who know

ayah: وَأَنجَيۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَكَانُواْ يَتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-anjayna alladhina amanu wakanu yattaquna

ayah: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ
ayah_translit: walutan idh qala liqawmihi atatuna al-fahishata wa-antum tub'siruna
ayah_english: And Lut when he said to his people Do you commit [the] immorality while you see

ayah: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهۡوَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تَجۡهَلُونَ
ayah_translit: a-innakum latatuna al-rijala shahwatan min duni al-nisai bal antum qawmun tajhaluna
ayah_english: Why do you approach the men (with) lust instead of instead of the women Nay you (are) a people ignorant

ayah: ۞فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ أَخۡرِجُوٓاْ ءَالَ لُوطٖ مِّن قَرۡيَتِكُمۡۖ إِنَّهُمۡ أُنَاسٞ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qalu akhriju ala lutin min qaryatikum innahum unasun yatatahharuna
ayah_english: But not was (the) answer (of) his people except that they said Drive out (the) family (of) Lut from your town Indeed they (are) people who keep clean and pure

ayah: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَٰهَا مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-anjaynahu wa-ahlahu illa im'ra-atahu qaddarnaha mina al-ghabirina
ayah_english: So We saved him and his family except his wife We destined her (to be) of those who remained behind

ayah: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَٰهَا مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

ayah: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-amtarna alayhim mataran fasaa mataru al-mundharina
ayah_english: And We rained upon them a rain and was evil (the) rain (on) those who were warned

ayah: قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيۡرٌ أَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: quli al-hamdu lillahi wasalamun ala ibadihi alladhina is'tafa allahu khayrun amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: Say All praise (be) to Allah and peace (be) upon His slaves those whom He has chosen Is Allah better or what they associate (with Him)

ayah: قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيۡرٌ أَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: quli al-hamdu lillahi wasalamun ala ibadihi alladhina is'tafa allahu khayrun amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: Say All praise (be) to Allah and peace (be) upon His slaves those whom He has chosen Is Allah better or what they associate (with Him)

ayah_english: Say All praise (be) to Allah and peace (be) upon His slaves those whom He has chosen Is Allah better or what they associate (with Him)

ayah: أَمَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ حَدَآئِقَ ذَاتَ بَهۡجَةٖ مَّا كَانَ لَكُمۡ أَن تُنۢبِتُواْ شَجَرَهَآۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ يَعۡدِلُونَ
ayah_translit: amman khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda wa-anzala lakum mina al-samai maan fa-anbatna bihi hadaiqa dhata bahjatin ma kana lakum an tunbitu shajaraha a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi bal hum qawmun ya'diluna
ayah_english: Or Who has created the heavens and the earth and sent down for you from the sky water And We caused to grow thereby gardens of beauty (and delight) of beauty (and delight) not it is for you that you cause to grow their trees Is there any god with Allah Nay they (are) a people who ascribe equals

ayah: أَمَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ حَدَآئِقَ ذَاتَ بَهۡجَةٖ مَّا كَانَ لَكُمۡ أَن تُنۢبِتُواْ شَجَرَهَآۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ يَعۡدِلُونَ

ayah_translit: amman khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda wa-anzala lakum mina al-samai maan fa-anbatna bihi hadaiqa dhata bahjatin ma kana lakum an tunbitu shajaraha a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi bal hum qawmun ya'diluna
ayah_english: Or Who has created the heavens and the earth and sent down for you from the sky water And We caused to grow thereby gardens of beauty (and delight) of beauty (and delight) not it is for you that you cause to grow their trees Is there any god with Allah Nay they (are) a people who ascribe equals

ayah: أَمَّن جَعَلَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ قَرَارٗا وَجَعَلَ خِلَٰلَهَآ أَنۡهَٰرٗا وَجَعَلَ لَهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَجَعَلَ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ حَاجِزًاۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: amman ja'ala al-arda qararan waja'ala khilalaha anharan waja'ala laha rawasiya waja'ala bayna al-bahrayni hajizan a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Or Who made the earth a firm abode and made (in) its midst rivers and made for it firm mountains and made between the two seas a barrier Is there any god with Allah Nay most of them (do) not know

ayah: أَمَّن جَعَلَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ قَرَارٗا وَجَعَلَ خِلَٰلَهَآ أَنۡهَٰرٗا وَجَعَلَ لَهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَجَعَلَ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ حَاجِزًاۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: أَمَّن جَعَلَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ قَرَارٗا وَجَعَلَ خِلَٰلَهَآ أَنۡهَٰرٗا وَجَعَلَ لَهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَجَعَلَ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ حَاجِزًاۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah_english: Or Who made the earth a firm abode and made (in) its midst rivers and made for it firm mountains and made between the two seas a barrier Is there any god with Allah Nay most of them (do) not know

ayah: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ ٱلۡمُضۡطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكۡشِفُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَيَجۡعَلُكُمۡ خُلَفَآءَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: amman yujibu al-mud'tara idha da'ahu wayakshifu al-sua wayaj'alukum khulafaa al-ardi a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi qalilan ma tadhakkaruna
ayah_english: Or Who responds (to) the distressed one when he calls Him and He removes the evil and makes you inheritors (of) the earth Is there any god with Allah Little (is) what you remember

ayah: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ ٱلۡمُضۡطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكۡشِفُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَيَجۡعَلُكُمۡ خُلَفَآءَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

ayah_translit: amman yujibu al-mud'tara idha da'ahu wayakshifu al-sua wayaj'alukum khulafaa al-ardi a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi qalilan ma tadhakkaruna
ayah_english: Or Who responds (to) the distressed one when he calls Him and He removes the evil and makes you inheritors (of) the earth Is there any god with Allah Little (is) what you remember

ayah_english: Or Who responds (to) the distressed one when he calls Him and He removes the evil and makes you inheritors (of) the earth Is there any god with Allah Little (is) what you remember

ayah: أَمَّن يَهۡدِيكُمۡ فِي ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ وَمَن يُرۡسِلُ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦٓۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ تَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: amman yahdikum fi zulumati al-bari wal-bahri waman yur'silu al-riyaha bush'ran bayna yaday rahmatihi a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi ta'ala al-lahu amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: Or Who guides you in (the) darkness[es] (of) the land and the sea and Who sends the winds (as) glad tidings before before His Mercy Is there any god with Allah High is Allah above what they associate (with Him)

ayah: أَمَّن يَهۡدِيكُمۡ فِي ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ وَمَن يُرۡسِلُ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦٓۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ تَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

ayah: أَمَّن يَهۡدِيكُمۡ فِي ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ وَمَن يُرۡسِلُ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦٓۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ تَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: amman yahdikum fi zulumati al-bari wal-bahri waman yur'silu al-riyaha bush'ran bayna yaday rahmatihi a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi ta'ala al-lahu amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: Or Who guides you in (the) darkness[es] (of) the land and the sea and Who sends the winds (as) glad tidings before before His Mercy Is there any god with Allah High is Allah above what they associate (with Him)

ayah: أَمَّن يَهۡدِيكُمۡ فِي ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ وَمَن يُرۡسِلُ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦٓۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ تَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

ayah_english: Or Who guides you in (the) darkness[es] (of) the land and the sea and Who sends the winds (as) glad tidings before before His Mercy Is there any god with Allah High is Allah above what they associate (with Him)

ayah: أَمَّن يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ وَمَن يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ قُلۡ هَاتُواْ بُرۡهَٰنَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: amman yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu waman yarzuqukum mina al-samai wal-ardi a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi qul hatu bur'hanakum in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: Or Who originates the creation then repeats it and Who provides you from the heavens and the earth Is there any god with Allah Say Bring forth your proof if you are truthful

ayah_english: Or Who originates the creation then repeats it and Who provides you from the heavens and the earth Is there any god with Allah Say Bring forth your proof if you are truthful

ayah: قُل لَّا يَعۡلَمُ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ
ayah_translit: qul la ya'lamu man fi al-samawati wal-ardi al-ghayba illa al-lahu wama yash'uruna ayyana yub'athuna
ayah_english: Say No (one) knows whoever (is) in the heavens and the earth (of) the unseen except Allah and not they perceive when they will be resurrected

ayah_translit: qul la ya'lamu man fi al-samawati wal-ardi al-ghayba illa al-lahu wama yash'uruna ayyana yub'athuna
ayah_english: Say No (one) knows whoever (is) in the heavens and the earth (of) the unseen except Allah and not they perceive when they will be resurrected

ayah: بَلِ ٱدَّـٰرَكَ عِلۡمُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّنۡهَاۖ بَلۡ هُم مِّنۡهَا عَمُونَ
ayah_translit: bali iddaraka il'muhum fi al-akhirati bal hum fi shakkin min'ha bal hum min'ha amuna
ayah_english: Nay is arrested their knowledge of the Hereafter Nay they (are) in doubt about it Nay they about it (are) blind

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبٗا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخۡرَجُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina kafaru a-idha kunna turaban waabauna a-inna lamukh'rajuna
ayah_english: And say those who disbelieve What when we have become dust and our forefathers will we surely be brought out

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبٗا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخۡرَجُونَ

ayah_english: And say those who disbelieve What when we have become dust and our forefathers will we surely be brought out

ayah: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا هَٰذَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: laqad wu'id'na hadha nahnu waabauna min qablu in hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
ayah_english: Certainly we have been promised this we and our forefathers before before Not (is) this except tales (of) the former (people)

ayah: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا هَٰذَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

ayah: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qul siru fi al-ardi fa-unzuru kayfa kana aqibatu al-muj'rimina
ayah_english: Say Travel in the land and see how was (the) end (of) the criminals

ayah: وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُن فِي ضَيۡقٖ مِّمَّا يَمۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wala tahzan alayhim wala takun fi dayqin mimma yamkuruna

ayah: قُلۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
ayah_translit: qul asa an yakuna radifa lakum ba'du alladhi tasta'jiluna
ayah_english: Say Perhaps that is close behind you some (of) that which you seek to hasten

ayah: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-inna rabbaka ladhu fadlin ala al-nasi walakinna aktharahum la yashkuruna
ayah_english: And indeed your Lord (is) full of Bounty (is) full of Bounty for the mankind but most of them (are) not grateful

ayah: إِنَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ يَقُصُّ عَلَىٰ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلَّذِي هُمۡ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
ayah_translit: inna hadha al-qur'ana yaqussu ala bani is'raila akthara alladhi hum fihi yakhtalifuna
ayah_english: Indeed this [the] Quran relates to (the) Children (of) Israel most (of) that they in it differ

ayah: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقۡضِي بَيۡنَهُم بِحُكۡمِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: inna rabbaka yaqdi baynahum bihuk'mihi wahuwa al-'azizu al-'alimu
ayah_english: Indeed your Lord will judge between them by His Judgment and He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Knower

ayah: فَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
ayah_translit: fatawakkal ala al-lahi innaka ala al-haqi al-mubini

ayah: إِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ
ayah_translit: innaka la tus'mi'u al-mawta wala tus'mi'u al-suma al-du'aa idha wallaw mud'birina
ayah_english: Indeed you (can)not cause to hear the dead and not can you cause to hear the deaf the call when they turn back retreating

ayah: إِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ
ayah_translit: innaka la tus'mi'u al-mawta wala tus'mi'u al-suma al-du'aa idha wallaw mud'birina

ayah_english: Indeed you (can)not cause to hear the dead and not can you cause to hear the deaf the call when they turn back retreating

ayah: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَٰدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيِ عَن ضَلَٰلَتِهِمۡۖ إِن تُسۡمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: wama anta bihadi al-'um'yi an dalalatihim in tus'mi'u illa man yu'minu biayatina fahum mus'limuna
ayah_english: And not (can) you guide the blind from their error Not you can cause to hear except (those) who believe in Our Signs so they (are) Muslims

ayah: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَٰدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيِ عَن ضَلَٰلَتِهِمۡۖ إِن تُسۡمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

ayah: ۞وَإِذَا وَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَخۡرَجۡنَا لَهُمۡ دَآبَّةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ تُكَلِّمُهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا لَا يُوقِنُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha waqa'a al-qawlu alayhim akhrajna lahum dabbatan mina al-ardi tukallimuhum anna al-nasa kanu biayatina la yuqinuna
ayah_english: And when (is) fulfilled the word against them We will bring forth for them a creature from the earth speaking to them that the people were of Our Signs not certain

ayah: ۞وَإِذَا وَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَخۡرَجۡنَا لَهُمۡ دَآبَّةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ تُكَلِّمُهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا لَا يُوقِنُونَ

ayah_translit: wa-idha waqa'a al-qawlu alayhim akhrajna lahum dabbatan mina al-ardi tukallimuhum anna al-nasa kanu biayatina la yuqinuna

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ فَوۡجٗا مِّمَّن يُكَذِّبُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ
ayah_translit: wayawma nahshuru min kulli ummatin fawjan mimman yukadhibu biayatina fahum yuza'una
ayah_english: And (the) Day We will gather from every nation a troop of (those) who deny Our Signs and they will be set in rows

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُو قَالَ أَكَذَّبۡتُم بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَمۡ تُحِيطُواْ بِهَا عِلۡمًا أَمَّاذَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: hatta idha jau qala akadhabtum biayati walam tuhitu biha il'man ammadha kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: Until when they come He will say Did you deny My Signs while not you encompassed them (in) knowledge or what you used (to) do

ayah: وَوَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
ayah_translit: wawaqa'a al-qawlu alayhim bima zalamu fahum la yantiquna
ayah_english: And (will be) fulfilled the word against them because they wronged and they (will) not speak

ayah: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا جَعَلۡنَا ٱلَّيۡلَ لِيَسۡكُنُواْ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبۡصِرًاۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: alam yaraw anna ja'alna al-layla liyaskunu fihi wal-nahara mub'siran inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
ayah_english: Do not they see that We [We] have made the night that they may rest in it and the day giving visibility Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for a people who believe

ayah: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا جَعَلۡنَا ٱلَّيۡلَ لِيَسۡكُنُواْ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبۡصِرًاۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوۡهُ دَٰخِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wayawma yunfakhu fi al-suri fafazi'a man fi al-samawati waman fi al-ardi illa man shaa al-lahu wakullun atawhu dakhirina
ayah_english: And (the) Day will be blown [in] the trumpet and will be terrified whoever (is) in the heavens and whoever (is) in the earth except whom Allah wills Allah wills And all (will) come to Him humbled

ayah_translit: wayawma yunfakhu fi al-suri fafazi'a man fi al-samawati waman fi al-ardi illa man shaa al-lahu wakullun atawhu dakhirina
ayah_english: And (the) Day will be blown [in] the trumpet and will be terrified whoever (is) in the heavens and whoever (is) in the earth except whom Allah wills Allah wills And all (will) come to Him humbled

ayah: وَتَرَى ٱلۡجِبَالَ تَحۡسَبُهَا جَامِدَةٗ وَهِيَ تَمُرُّ مَرَّ ٱلسَّحَابِۚ صُنۡعَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَتۡقَنَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍۚ إِنَّهُۥ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
ayah_translit: watara al-jibala tahsabuha jamidatan wahiya tamurru marra al-sahabi sun'a al-lahi alladhi atqana kulla shayin innahu khabirun bima taf 'aluna
ayah_english: And you see the mountains thinking them firmly fixed while they will pass (as the) passing (of) the clouds (The) Work (of) Allah Who perfected all things Indeed He (is) All-Aware of what you do

ayah: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهَا وَهُم مِّن فَزَعٖ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ءَامِنُونَ
ayah_translit: man jaa bil-hasanati falahu khayrun min'ha wahum min faza'in yawma-idhin aminuna
ayah_english: Whoever comes with the good then for him (will be) better than it and they from (the) terror (of) that Day (will be) safe

ayah: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهَا وَهُم مِّن فَزَعٖ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ءَامِنُونَ
ayah_translit: man jaa bil-hasanati falahu khayrun min'ha wahum min faza'in yawma-idhin aminuna
ayah_english: Whoever comes with the good then for him (will be) better than it and they from (the) terror (of) that Day (will be) safe

ayah: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهَا وَهُم مِّن فَزَعٖ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ءَامِنُونَ

ayah: وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: waman jaa bil-sayi-ati fakubbat wujuhuhum fi al-nari hal tuj'zawna illa ma kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: And whoever comes with the evil will be cast down their faces in the Fire Are you recompensed except (for) what you used (to) do

ayah: وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: إِنَّمَآ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ رَبَّ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡبَلۡدَةِ ٱلَّذِي حَرَّمَهَا وَلَهُۥ كُلُّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: innama umir'tu an a'buda rabba hadhihi al-baldati alladhi harramaha walahu kullu shayin wa-umir'tu an akuna mina al-mus'limina
ayah_english: Only I am commanded that I worship (the) Lord (of) this city the One Who made it sacred and to Him (belongs) all things And I am commanded that I be of the Muslims

ayah: إِنَّمَآ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ رَبَّ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡبَلۡدَةِ ٱلَّذِي حَرَّمَهَا وَلَهُۥ كُلُّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

ayah: وَأَنۡ أَتۡلُوَاْ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَۖ فَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهۡتَدِي لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنذِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-an atluwa al-qur'ana famani ih'tada fa-innama yahtadi linafsihi waman dalla faqul innama ana mina al-mundhirina
ayah_english: And that I recite the Quran And whoever accepts guidance then only he accepts guidance for himself and whoever goes astray then say Only I am of the warners

ayah: وَأَنۡ أَتۡلُوَاْ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَۖ فَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهۡتَدِي لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنذِرِينَ

ayah: وَقُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ سَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَتَعۡرِفُونَهَاۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: waquli al-hamdu lillahi sayurikum ayatihi fata'rifunaha wama rabbuka bighafilin amma ta'maluna
ayah_english: And say All praise (be) to Allah He will show you His Signs and you will recognize them And your Lord is not And your Lord is not unaware of what you do
